thread.title: Richard Billows
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Richard Billows

author: Richard Billows
title: Richard Billows
text:
Easy to send pics and query about my Mira shower, had a response in 20 minutes by e-mail.
Spoke on the phone, guy was very helpful and ordered parts which I was told wpuld be with me next. Able to track package through their system. Received another e -mail apologising but there would be a delay and package delayed till the wednesday. Recieved text in the morning giving me the 1 hour slot package would be here and it was, you can even track exactly where your driver is and how many drops before you. Brilliant level of customer service.
